comment._content: He appears to be making this map, shown elsewhere in the Bain Collection, a "War Map of Europe": And.. same fellow printing (or embossing) proofs here:

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: books.google.com/books?id=aKLVAAAAMAAJ&pg=PA11&lp... shows a different map, but likely is describing the same operation. This piece in Popular Mechanics gives a war map as an example of an illustration in the Matilda Ziegler Magazine for the Blind. The publication is still active, although it may now only be published onlline (simple layout, plain text) and as audio. See www.matildaziegler.com/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Yes, the braille magazine was discontinued in 2009. See www.nfb.org/Images/nfb/Publications/bm/bm09/bm0911/bm0911...
